commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
version: '3.9'

services:


  kafka:
    image: confluentinc/cp-kafka:latest
    depends_on:
      - zookeeper
    networks:
      - local
    ports:
      - "9092:9092"
      - "29092:29092"
    environment:
      KAFKA_BROKER_ID: 1
      KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT: zookeeper:2181
      KAFKA_LISTENERS: PLAINTEXT://0.0.0.0:9092,PLAINTEXT_HOST://0.0.0.0:29092
      KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS: PLAINTEXT://kafka:9092,PLAINTEXT_HOST://172.31.0.2:29092
      KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP: PLAINTEXT:PLAINTEXT,PLAINTEXT_HOST:PLAINTEXT
      KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR: 1
      KAFKA_LOG_RETENTION_HOURS: 24
      KAFKA_LOG_SEGMENT_BYTES: 1073741824


  app:
    build:
      context: ../../  # Relative path to the Laravel project root
      dockerfile: docker/development/Dockerfile
    container_name: laravel-app
    volumes:
      - ../../:/var/www/html
    depends_on:
      - kafka
      - db
      - redis
    ports:
      - "5174:5173" # Vite development server port
    networks:
      local:
          ipv4_address: ${DOCKER_API_IP:-192.168.100.6}

  nginx:
    image: nginx:latest
    container_name: nginx
    volumes:
      - ../../:/var/www/html
      - ./nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d
    ports:
      - "8866:80"
    depends_on:
      - app
    networks:
      local:
        ipv4_address: ${DOCKER_NGINX_IP:-192.168.100.8}

  db:
    image: mysql:8.0
    container_name: mysql_db
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
      MYSQL_DATABASE: laravel
      MYSQL_USER: laravel
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: secret
    ports:
      - "3366:3306"
    volumes:
      - dbdata:/var/lib/mysql
    networks:
      local:
          ipv4_address: ${DOCKER_DB_IP:-192.168.100.3}

  mail-catcher:
      image: dockage/mailcatcher:0.8.2
      restart: always
      ports:
          - "1080:1080"

  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"
    networks:
      local:
        ipv4_address: ${DOCKER_REDIS_IP:-192.168.100.7}

  workers-server:
      build:
        context: ../../  # Relative path to the Laravel project root
        dockerfile: docker/development/Dockerfile
      volumes:
          - "../../:/var/www/html/"
          - "./supervisor:/etc/supervisor/conf.d/"
      privileged: true
      command: "/usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/supervisord -n -c /etc/supervisor/supervisord.conf"
      networks:
        local:
            ipv4_address: ${DOCKER_WORKERS_IP:-192.168.100.4}

  horizon:
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: laravel-horizon
    depends_on:
      - app
      - redis
    command: php artisan horizon
    networks:
      local:
        ipv4_address: ${DOCKER_HORIZON_IP:-192.168.100.9}

networks:
  local:
    driver: bridge
    ipam:
      config:
        - subnet: ${DOCKER_SUBNET:-192.168.100.0/24}


volumes:
  dbdata:
